cast.name: 瑞提希·德希穆克 Riteish Deshmukh

introduction: Double Dhamaal (English: Double Fun), originally titled Dhamaal 2 is an upcoming Indian comedy film directed by Indra Kumar, and a sequel to the 2007 film Dhamaal.The film is set to release on 24 June 2011, and shot in the Mehboob Studio, Mauritius and Hong Kong. At the 'Mahurat' of the film, it was announced that the four jokers, Riteish Deshmukh, Arshad Warsi, Aashish Chaudhary and Jaaved Jaaferi will be reprising their roles as friends again, while Sanjay Dutt plays a millionaire this time. The film will focus on the four friends blackmailing Dutt to share all his fortune in the most hilarious ways they can think of. The film finished shooting early May 2011, and brought rights to remake the song "Oye Oye" remixed from the 1989 action film, Tridev.wiki
